title: How to Make a Reese's Peanut Butter Cake

steps.headline: Prepare cake as directed on box using a 9 x 13 x 2 (23 x 33 x 3 cm) cake pan.
Add sugar, vanilla, shortening, milk and peanut butter  to a mixing bowl to make the frosting.
Beat until smooth and creamy, add more milk until you like the consistency.
Frost the cake, and then sprinkle with the chopped Reese's Peanut Butter cups.

text: Prepare cake as directed on box using a 9 x 13 x 2 (23 x 33 x 3 cm) cake pan.  Cool completely.  Add sugar, vanilla, shortening, milk and peanut butter  to a mixing bowl to make the frosting.  Beat until smooth and creamy, add more milk until you like the consistency.  Frost the cake, and then sprinkle with the chopped Reese's Peanut Butter cups.
